helpMessages2d.point: Click on the map to add a point.
helpMessages2d.mesh: Click on the map to place the model.
helpMessages2d.polylineZeroVertices: Click on the map to start drawing.
helpMessages2d.polylineOneVertex: Double-click on the map to complete.
helpMessages2d.polygonZeroVertices: Click on the map to start drawing.
helpMessages2d.polygonOneVertex: Click on the map to continue drawing.
helpMessages2d.polygonTwoVertices: Double-click on the map to complete.
helpMessages2d.meshTooFar: Zoom in for a better view of the model.
helpMessages2d.meshTooClose: Zoom out for a better view of the model.

helpMessages3d.point: Click in the scene to add a point.
helpMessages3d.polylineZeroVertices: Click in the scene to start drawing.
helpMessages3d.polylineOneVertex: Double-click in the scene to complete.
helpMessages3d.polygonZeroVertices: Click in the scene to start drawing.
helpMessages3d.polygonOneVertex: Click in the scene to continue drawing.
helpMessages3d.polygonTwoVertices: Double-click in the scene to complete.
helpMessages3d.mesh: Click in the scene to place the model.
helpMessages3d.meshTooFar: Zoom in for a better view of the model.
helpMessages3d.meshTooClose: Zoom out for a better view of the model.
